display_long_description:
Play 2 games in one app.

Role Play Mode (2048 RPG):
Merge blocks to create attack points. Then use it to defeat powerful creatures. But be careful they are getting stronger each wave. So you need to upgrade yourself. There is no end in this challenge.

Normal 2048 Mode:
Merge blocks to make points. Your goal is reaching best score as possible as you can.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Quest Edition :
No in app purchases and ads.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
* 2048 is originally created by Gabriele Cirulli
* Characters designed by Burak Ozturk
* Developed by Sener Projects
* Music and SFX provided by SwishSwoosh and LordStirling
